_meta.description: Default experiment presets for the Debug Framework Agent. common = product-agnostic; GNR/CWF/DMR = product-specific presets (boot_cases, content_cases, fuse_collection).
_meta.usage: Agent loads this file on Mode 1 startup. User picks a preset by number/name; agent pre-fills all fields and only prompts ask_user fields.

1_baseline_loops_dragon.label: Baseline Loops — Dragon (vbump)
1_baseline_loops_dragon.description: Standard baseline loop test using Dragon content, vbump voltage mode. Most common starting point for new experiments.

2_ppvc_loops_dragon.label: PPVC Loops — Dragon (ppvc)
2_ppvc_loops_dragon.description: PPVC (Per-Pin Voltage Control) loop test using Dragon content. Used for power-delivery characterization.

3_fixed_voltage_loops_dragon.label: Fixed Voltage Loops — Dragon
3_fixed_voltage_loops_dragon.description: Loop test at a fixed IA voltage. Good for margin characterization at a specific operating point.

4_voltage_sweep_ia.label: Voltage Sweep — IA Domain
4_voltage_sweep_ia.description: Sweeps IA domain voltage from Start to End in Steps. Used to find voltage margins.

5_frequency_sweep_ia.label: Frequency Sweep — IA Domain
5_frequency_sweep_ia.description: Sweeps IA domain frequency from Start to End in Steps (MHz). Used to find frequency margins.

6_shmoo_test.label: Shmoo Test
6_shmoo_test.description: Shmoo-based test using a pre-defined shmoo file. Maps pass/fail regions across a 2D parameter space.

7_baseline_loops_linux.label: Baseline Loops — Linux
7_baseline_loops_linux.description: Baseline loop test using a Linux binary/script. Use when content runs under Linux OS rather than Dragon.

8_slice_mode_loops.label: Slice Mode Loops — Dragon (single core)
8_slice_mode_loops.description: Loop test targeting a single core (Slice mode). Core number set via Configuration (Mask). Use for per-core debug isolation.

9_stress_all_fail.label: Stress Test — AllFail Mode
9_stress_all_fail.description: High-loop-count stress test designed for AllFailFlowInstance use. Only routes to fail if ALL loops fail — tolerates transient failures.

gnr_boot_baseline.label: GNR — Boot Baseline
gnr_boot_baseline.description: Standard GNR boot loop (PYSVConsole). Most common starting point for boot-failure investigation.

gnr_boot_issue.label: GNR — Boot Issue
gnr_boot_issue.description: Non-resetting boot loop. Halts at 0xbf000000 breakpoint for live debug access.

gnr_bootissue_vbcfc.label: GNR — Boot vbump CFC Sweep
gnr_bootissue_vbcfc.description: Boot sweep on CFC voltage domain. Margin characterization for non-booting debug.

gnr_bootissue_vbia.label: GNR — Boot vbump IA Sweep
gnr_bootissue_vbia.description: Boot sweep on IA voltage domain.

gnr_bootissue_flatcfc.label: GNR — Boot CFC Frequency Flat
gnr_bootissue_flatcfc.description: Boot frequency sweep on CFC domain (8-22 GHz, 4 GHz steps).

gnr_bootissue_flatia.label: GNR — Boot IA Frequency Flat
gnr_bootissue_flatia.description: Boot frequency sweep on IA domain (8-32 GHz, 4 GHz steps).

gnr_maskcheck_firstpass.label: GNR — Mask Check FirstPass
gnr_maskcheck_firstpass.description: Boot loop using ATE mask 'FirstPass'. Isolates failing core regions during debug.

gnr_maskcheck_secondpass.label: GNR — Mask Check SecondPass
gnr_maskcheck_secondpass.description: Boot loop using ATE mask 'SecondPass'. Isolates failing core regions during debug.

gnr_maskcheck_thirdpass.label: GNR — Mask Check ThirdPass
gnr_maskcheck_thirdpass.description: Boot loop using ATE mask 'ThirdPass'. Isolates failing core regions during debug.

gnr_maskcheck_rowpass1.label: GNR — Mask Check RowPass1
gnr_maskcheck_rowpass1.description: Boot loop using ATE mask 'RowPass1'. Isolates failing core regions during debug.

gnr_maskcheck_rowpass2.label: GNR — Mask Check RowPass2
gnr_maskcheck_rowpass2.description: Boot loop using ATE mask 'RowPass2'. Isolates failing core regions during debug.

gnr_maskcheck_rowpass3.label: GNR — Mask Check RowPass3
gnr_maskcheck_rowpass3.description: Boot loop using ATE mask 'RowPass3'. Isolates failing core regions during debug.

gnr_fuse_collection.label: GNR — Fuse Collection
gnr_fuse_collection.description: Runs fuse_generation.txt. Collects fuse override values for margin tuning.

gnr_baseline.label: GNR — Baseline Dragon (vbump)
gnr_baseline.description: Standard GNR mesh Dragon loop. vbump mode. Check Core 36.

gnr_baseline_ppvc.label: GNR — Baseline Dragon (ppvc)
gnr_baseline_ppvc.description: GNR mesh Dragon loop with PPVC voltage mode. VVAR0=0x1C9C380.

gnr_baseline_xtended.label: GNR — Baseline Extended (ppvc)
gnr_baseline_xtended.description: Extended GNR mesh loop. PPVC + VVAR0=0x989680.

gnr_slice_tsltiny.label: GNR — Slice TSL Mini
gnr_slice_tsltiny.description: Single-core Slice mode (core 36). Runs TSL MLC ocelot flows under Linux.

gnr_cfc_voltage.label: GNR — CFC Voltage Sweep
gnr_cfc_voltage.description: CFC voltage sweep. Start=0.05 V, End=0.2 V, Steps=0.05.

gnr_cfc_frequency.label: GNR — CFC Frequency Flat
gnr_cfc_frequency.description: CFC frequency sweep 8-22 GHz, 4 GHz steps.

gnr_ia_voltage.label: GNR — IA Voltage Sweep
gnr_ia_voltage.description: IA voltage sweep. Start=0.05 V, End=0.2 V, Steps=0.05.

gnr_ia_freq_lo.label: GNR — IA Frequency Low
gnr_ia_freq_lo.description: IA frequency sweep 8-32 GHz, 4 GHz steps.

gnr_ia_freq_hi.label: GNR — IA Frequency High
gnr_ia_freq_hi.description: High-end IA frequency sweep 36-40 GHz, 4 GHz steps. Uses FirstPass ATE mask.

gnr_tsl3s_breadth.label: GNR — TSL3s_Breadth
gnr_tsl3s_breadth.description: GNR 3s breadth TSL; tests wide memory access patterns.

gnr_tsl1s_breadth.label: GNR — TSL1s_Breadth
gnr_tsl1s_breadth.description: GNR 1s breadth TSL; quicker breadth screen.

gnr_tsl3s_br.label: GNR — TSL3s_BR
gnr_tsl3s_br.description: GNR 3s bit-reverse TSL; targets bit-reversal addressing patterns.

gnr_tsl1s_br.label: GNR — TSL1s_BR
gnr_tsl1s_br.description: GNR 1s bit-reverse TSL; quicker BR screen.

gnr_mlc.label: GNR — MLC (Memory Latency Checker)
gnr_mlc.description: GNR MLC ocelot 4-flow suite. Memory bandwidth and latency characterization.

gnr_sandstone.label: GNR — Sandstone
gnr_sandstone.description: GNR Sandstone memory stress test (5 loops, 200s timeout, -vv).

gnr_fuse_collection.label: GNR — Fuse Collection
gnr_fuse_collection.description: Runs fuse_generation.txt. Generates fuse override values for margin analysis.

cwf_base_drag_h.label: CWF — Base Dragon H (vbump)
cwf_base_drag_h.description: Standard CWF Dragon mesh loop. Check Core 7. vbump mode with Volt/Freq hints.

cwf_base_ppvc.label: CWF — Base Dragon PPVC
cwf_base_ppvc.description: CWF PPVC mode Dragon loop. VVAR1=0x80064000.

cwf_cfc_vbp.label: CWF — CFC Voltage (vbP)
cwf_cfc_vbp.description: CWF CFC voltage bump sweep. Range -0.03 to +0.06 V, 0.03 V steps. 3 loops.

cwf_cfc_flats.label: CWF — CFC Frequency Flats
cwf_cfc_flats.description: CWF CFC frequency flat sweep. 8-12 GHz, 4 GHz steps.

cwf_ia_vbp.label: CWF — IA Voltage (vbP)
cwf_ia_vbp.description: CWF IA voltage bump sweep. Range -0.03 to +0.06 V, 0.03 V steps.

cwf_ia_flats.label: CWF — IA Frequency Flats
cwf_ia_flats.description: CWF IA frequency flat sweep. 8-12 GHz, 4 GHz steps.

cwf_linux_baseline.label: CWF — Baseline Linux (MLC)
cwf_linux_baseline.description: CWF Linux baseline using MLC ocelot mp2 flow.

cwf_slice_baseline.label: CWF — Baseline Slice (Dragon)
cwf_slice_baseline.description: Single-core Slice targeting CWF core 7. Dragon content with pseudoSBFT.

cwf_fuse_collection.label: CWF — Fuse Collection
cwf_fuse_collection.description: Runs fuse_generation.txt with CWF paths. Generates CWF fuse override values.

dmr_boot_baseline.label: DMR — Boot Baseline
dmr_boot_baseline.description: DMR boot baseline (PYSVConsole). Halts at 0xbf000000. Check Core 32. No reset.

dmr_dragon_base_h.label: DMR — Dragon Base H
dmr_dragon_base_h.description: Standard DMR Dragon mesh loop (H bin). Check Core 24. Includes TOR dump post-process.

dmr_dragon_base_m.label: DMR — Dragon Base M
dmr_dragon_base_m.description: DMR Dragon mesh loop — M bin content. No post-process.

dmr_dragon_base_r.label: DMR — Dragon Base R
dmr_dragon_base_r.description: DMR Dragon mesh loop — R bin content.

dmr_cfc_vbp.label: DMR — CFC Voltage (vbP)
dmr_cfc_vbp.description: DMR CFC voltage bump sweep. Range -0.03 to +0.06 V, 0.03 V steps.

dmr_cfc_flatr.label: DMR — CFC Frequency Flat
dmr_cfc_flatr.description: DMR CFC frequency flat sweep. 8-12 GHz, 4 GHz steps.

dmr_ia_flatr.label: DMR — IA Frequency Flat
dmr_ia_flatr.description: DMR IA frequency flat sweep. 8-24 GHz, 4 GHz steps.

dmr_ia_vbp.label: DMR — IA Voltage (vbP)
dmr_ia_vbp.description: DMR IA voltage bump sweep. Range -0.03 to +0.06 V, 0.03 V steps.

dmr_slice_base.label: DMR — Dragon Base Slice
dmr_slice_base.description: DMR single-core Slice mode (core 24). Slice pseudoSBFT tester content.

dmr_corehi.label: DMR — Dragon Base COREHI (Core 1)
dmr_corehi.description: DMR RO mesh targeting Core 1 (higher). Disable 1 Core = 0x2.

dmr_corelo.label: DMR — Dragon Base CORELO (Core 0)
dmr_corelo.description: DMR RO mesh targeting Core 0 (lower). Disable 1 Core = 0x1.

dmr_slice_cbb0.label: DMR — Slice_CBB0
dmr_slice_cbb0.description: DMR Slice CBB0 targeting Check Core=7. pseudoSBFT slice content.

dmr_slice_cbb1_32.label: DMR — Slice_CBB1_32
dmr_slice_cbb1_32.description: DMR Slice CBB1 targeting Check Core=32. pseudoSBFT slice content.

dmr_slice_cbb1_48.label: DMR — Slice_CBB1_48
dmr_slice_cbb1_48.description: DMR Slice CBB1 targeting Check Core=48. pseudoSBFT slice content.

dmr_slice_cbb2.label: DMR — Slice_CBB2
dmr_slice_cbb2.description: DMR Slice CBB2 targeting Check Core=84. pseudoSBFT slice content.

dmr_slice_cbb3.label: DMR — Slice_CBB3
dmr_slice_cbb3.description: DMR Slice CBB3 targeting Check Core=126. pseudoSBFT slice content.

dmr_corehi_cbb0.label: DMR — COREHI (Core 1) Cbb0
dmr_corehi_cbb0.description: DMR RO mesh targeting COREHI (Core 1), ATE mask Cbb0, Check Core=0.

dmr_corehi_cbb1.label: DMR — COREHI (Core 1) Cbb1
dmr_corehi_cbb1.description: DMR RO mesh targeting COREHI (Core 1), ATE mask Cbb1, Check Core=32.

dmr_corelo_cbb2.label: DMR — CORELO (Core 0) Cbb2
dmr_corelo_cbb2.description: DMR RO mesh targeting CORELO (Core 0), ATE mask Cbb2, Check Core=64.

dmr_corelo_cbb3.label: DMR — CORELO (Core 0) Cbb2
dmr_corelo_cbb3.description: DMR RO mesh targeting CORELO (Core 0), ATE mask Cbb2, Check Core=104.

dmr_corehi_compute0.label: DMR — COREHI (Core 1) Compute0
dmr_corehi_compute0.description: DMR RO mesh targeting COREHI (Core 1), ATE mask Compute0, Check Core=32.

dmr_corehi_compute1.label: DMR — COREHI (Core 1) Compute1
dmr_corehi_compute1.description: DMR RO mesh targeting COREHI (Core 1), ATE mask Compute1, Check Core=32.

dmr_corelo_compute2.label: DMR — CORELO (Core 0) Compute2
dmr_corelo_compute2.description: DMR RO mesh targeting CORELO (Core 0), ATE mask Compute2, Check Core=48.

dmr_corelo_compute3.label: DMR — CORELO (Core 0) Compute3
dmr_corelo_compute3.description: DMR RO mesh targeting CORELO (Core 0), ATE mask Compute3, Check Core=32.

dmr_fuse_generator.label: DMR — Fuse Generator
dmr_fuse_generator.description: Runs fuse_generation_dmr.txt. DMR-specific fuse override generation.
